title: She is Awesome
description: When Andi started her new job at Global Green, she didn't expect a terrorist attack within the first week! Or is there something more going on? She meets Bates and his teammates when they are called in to investigate the case. Bates isn't just pushing the case, but also pushing Andi out of her comfort zone.This is a short romantic story to make you feel good. No cheating or cliffhangers. Only happily ever after with a little bit of action along the way. Have fun reading! Available for free on Kobo.
author: Suzanna Stone
